Event.name: Adjusting
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> changes a <fen>Part</fen> of a complex entity with regard to some <fen>Feature</fen> in order to achieve some <fen>Imposed_purpose</fen> affected by the <fen>Feature</fen>. The complex entity is often a device or mechanism, but may also be an abstract entity such as the economy. Also, the full entity may be used in place of the <fen>Part</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> need to <t>adjust</t> <fex name="Part">the thermostat</fex> <fex name="Final_value">to around 80 degrees</fex> <fex name="Time">when she visits</fex>.</ex> <ex>It didn't work the first time , so <fex name="Agent">she</fex> had to <t>tweak</t> <fex name="Part">the oven</fex> <fex name="Degree">a little</fex> .</ex> <ex>Greenspan expressed confidence that the <fex name="Time">current</fex> <t>calibration</t> <fex name="Feature">of interest rates</fex> was not an overcompensation .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that controls the value of a <fen>Feature</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Part
Arg.definition: <def-root>The part of the complex entity which is changed in the process of adjusting. <ex>She <t>adjusted</t> <fex name="Part">the injectors</fex> to make the mixture leaner.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Feature
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Feature</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Part</fen> is adjusted. <ex>She <t>adjusted</t> <fex name="Feature">the temperature of the oven</fex> <fex name="Purpose">so that the pie crust would brown a little</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Imposed_purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The state of the <fen>Part</fen> with respect to the <fen>Feature</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> brings about by making the adjustment.
<ex>You should <t>adjust</t> the antenna <fex name="imp">to poke outside the bag</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> which affects the <fen>Part</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the adjusting takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the adjusting occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Final_value
Arg.definition: <def-root>The value associated with the <fen>Feature</fen> that the system ends up in.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> to adjust the <fen>Part</fen> and <fen>Feature</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to bring about by adjusting.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the adjustment act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the amount that the <fen>Final_value</fen> and Initial_value differ.
<ex>Do n't <t>adjust</t> the pressure <fex name="deg">by more than two PSI</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: adjust.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to change the location of some part or the degree of some quanity by a (relatively) small amount, especially in order to cause some system to function better

lexUnit.name: adjustment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A (relatively) small change made in some part of a complex system made in order to cause it to function better.

lexUnit.name: tweak.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to change the location of some part or the degree of some quanity by a very small amount, especially in order to cause some system to function better

lexUnit.name: tweak.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A very small change made in some part of a complex system made in order to cause it to function better.

lexUnit.name: calibrate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To adjust something to make it accord with a standard or norm.

lexUnit.name: calibration.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of adjusting something so that it will accord with a norm or standard.
